alert.note: Alert for Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 29 at 2:59PM CDT until May 29 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE AND THE NORTHEAST TEXAS PANHANDLE... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Beaver. In Texas...Ochiltree. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 6 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...4 TO 8. * Timing...11 AM CDT through 10 PM CDT today.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.
